predicate.note: Frames file for 'juggle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: manage many different things at once

example.name: the one example
example.text: Not surprisingly, old-style money managers have been losing clients to giant stock-index funds that *trace* use computers *trace* to juggle portfolios so they mirror the S&P 500.
